iati-activity.title: KYRGYZSTAN HEALTH Sector Wide Approach "on budget sector support"
iati-activity.description: Through the implementation of the Manas Taalimi (health sector strategy 2005-2010) improve the health status of the people through the creation of a responsive, efficient, comprehensive and integrated system of individual and public health services delivery, increased responsibility of every citizen, family, society, state power and public administration bodies of health of each person and society in general. Additional donor objectives: to contribute to broader harmonisation efforts and strengthening public budgeting, procurement and financial management. The two “rules” for the SWAP are Rule 1- budget allocation and rule 2 budget- execution

contact-info.mailing-address: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
